business_analysis.description:
**Business Summary of Manipal Fintech**

**Business Model:**
Manipal Fintech operates as a fintech platform specializing in gold loans. The company leverages technology to provide quick and minimal paperwork gold loans, making the process efficient and customer-friendly. It offers services both online and offline, including doorstep services where loan officers visit customers' homes to complete the loan process.

**Industry:**
Manipal Fintech is part of the financial services industry, specifically within the niche of gold loans, which is a segment of the broader lending market.

**Key Products/Services:**
1. **Gold Loans:** The primary product, allowing customers to secure loans using their gold jewelry as collateral.
2. **Balance Transfer:** Customers can transfer their existing gold loans to Manipal Fintech to benefit from lower interest rates.
3. **Gold Loan at Home:** A service where loan officers visit customers' homes to facilitate the loan process.

**Market Position:**
Manipal Fintech positions itself as India’s most trusted Gold-Tech platform. It has disbursed over ₹16,000 crore in loans to more than 400,000 customers across India, indicating a strong market presence and customer trust. The company is backed by The Manipal Group, which adds to its credibility and trustworthiness.

**Financial Information:**
- **Loans Disbursed:** Over ₹16,000 crore.
- **Customer Base:** More than 400,000 customers.
- **Interest Rates:** Starting at 9.48% per annum.
- **Company Size:** 201-500 employees.
- **Headquarters:** Gurugram, Haryana.
- **Founded:** 2018.

**Recent Developments:**
- Hosted "Beyond Bullion - Redefining Lending Through Fintech 2025" event, showcasing their commitment to innovation and collaboration in the fintech space.
- Announced new leadership appointments to drive business growth and strategy.

**Conclusion:**
Manipal Fintech is a significant player in the gold loan segment of the financial services industry in India. With a strong backing from The Manipal Group, a large customer base, and substantial loan disbursements, it is well-positioned to continue its growth and innovation in the fintech sector.

recommendations: LinkedIn User “Here’s a more concise, three-paragraph version of your recommendation: I had the privilege of working directly under Puja’s leadership, and she is undoubtedly one of the finest managers I have had the opportunity to work with. Puja fosters a culture of inclusivity, ensuring every team member feels valued and heard. Her empathetic approach and ability to encourage team participation leave a lasting impression on everyone she works with. From a business perspective, Puja is sharp and decisive, with an exceptional ability to assess her team’s strengths and weaknesses. She strategically assigns tasks to maximize productivity and brings out the best in her team, driving outstanding results while motivating individuals to perform at their highest potential. Personally, I have always looked up to Puja for guidance and inspiration. Her leadership style has significantly influenced my approach to work and has set a benchmark for what great management looks like. She is truly a remarkable leader and an asset to any organization.”

Varun Jain “I had the pleasure of working with Puja Singh at Mastercard for about 4 years, she is a true business leader with a proven track record of success in the financial services industry. Her ability to drive significant results is exceptional. She's a strategic thinker, an effective communicator and a highly motivated individual with a genuine passion for achieving results. Puja is a valuable asset to any team. Her strong work ethic, collaborative spirit & dedication to excellence make her a standout performer. I have no doubt she will continue to achieve great things in her career.”

detailed_profile.about: Hey, Thanks for visiting my profile. I have had quite a wonderful corporate journey so far with my range of experience varying from manufacturing industries(Building Materials, Consumer durables) to the Service industry (Financial Services) my role prima facie being to understand the business requirements and suggest/implement effective actionable on the same. In my 3 year journey, I have closely worked with the CEO, President, COO, and other key top management officials to learn the Strategy formation, decision-making process, priority matrix, project management, etc. I started with Somany Impresa Group in July 2021 in the New Business & Growth Strategy department. I was deeply involved in the group transformation processes, new business creation, and Group corporate dashboard & deck creation within the Group. Feel free to connect or share any career opportunity with me. Looking forward to our interaction

experience.description_html:
1. Program Manager: Insurance Go-Live
● Spearheaded the end-to-end go-to-market (GTM) strategy for a new insurance vertical, including
target segmentation, product positioning, and launch planning.
● Developed comprehensive program roadmaps with key milestones, deliverables, and cross-functional
execution timelines.
● Designed and implemented core operational processes (lead management, policy issuance, claims
handling) with integrated automation to enhance efficiency and system alignment.
2. Program Lead – Agent Engagement Pilot (PAN India)
● Designed and implemented a PAN India agent engagement framework, targeting priority segments
and high-potential regions.
● Led on-ground execution in Delhi and established monitoring mechanisms to track program
performance and engagement KPIs.
● Achieved 10% agent reactivation and 20% increase in business across 5 key states, driving measurable
growth for Manipal Fintech.
3. Lead – Bank Empanelment & Agreement Execution
● Acted as the primary liaison (SPOC) for Manipal Fintech partnerships with major banks, ensuring
end-to-end compliance and coordination.
● Successfully led the empanelment process with IDBI and Kotak Mahindra Bank, aligning with
regulatory and operational requirements.
● Supported agreement screening and negotiation with private banks in collaboration with C-suite
executives, ensuring favorable terms and risk mitigation.
4..Strategic Lead – New Business Ideation & Opportunity Mapping
● Created a structured ideation pipeline to systematically capture, assess, and prioritize new business
concepts.
● Conducted market potential analysis for identified ideas, evaluating feasibility, scalability, and alignment
with company objectives.
● Mapped opportunities for product portfolio expansion in unexplored segments, supporting long-term
growth strategy

detailed_profile.name: Gaurav Srivastava
detailed_profile.position: Chief Sales Officer at Manipal Fintech- Gold Loans
detailed_profile.about: As the Chief Sales Officer at Manipal Fintech , I lead the sales organization to drive sustainable growth in the Gold loans , Credit cards , Revenue based financing , Personal Loans , Consumer Durables , BFSI segment. With over 20 years of experience in sales and marketing, I have a proven track record of building high-performance teams, launching new channels, and optimizing existing ones for maximum efficiency and customer satisfaction. I was also a co-founder of Elements of Decor, a startup in the home decor industry targeting the mass affluent segment. I launched the brand on an eCommerce marketplace, overseeing product selection, quality checks, and customer satisfaction. Additionally, I developed strategic partnerships with suppliers to ensure a diverse product range and competitive pricing. My expertise in business leadership, new business development, and business strategy has enabled me to achieve remarkable results in various sectors, including B2B, eCommerce, and online companies.

recommendations: Gaurav Bhusari “Gaurav Sir is one of those rare leaders who bring people “where they are”to “where they need to be” I always feel myself very lucky that I worked under your leadership in Sbicard and understood its definition in real sense. He is a great asset to have in your team.”

detailed_profile.name: Allan Fernandes
detailed_profile.position: Head of Product - Fintech | Product Strategy & Growth | Agent Network Onboarding | GTM | Operational Efficiency | IIM B | Ex-PwC
detailed_profile.about: As a Fintech Product Leader, I specialize in building 0-to-1 platforms from the ground up and leveraging AI to solve high-stakes business problems. My experience spans from launching disruptive products in agile startup environments to leading large-scale digital transformation in enterprise settings. I thrive on turning complex challenges into scalable, revenue-generating solutions. Key Achievements & Impact - Agent Network Scaling (Manipal FinTech): Architected and launched a B2B agent network from scratch, scaling it to drive over ₹15 Cr in monthly transaction value and reimagining the entire operational lifecycle from onboarding to reconciliation. - Enterprise Transformation (Genpact/TCS for PwC UK): Led multi-million dollar digital transformation programs, re-engineering enterprise architectures to boost productivity and increasing invoice auto-posting efficiency from 10% to over 60%. - AI-Powered Lending (Manipal FinTech): Currently leading the development of a 0-to-1 commercial lending platform. Deployed an AI underwriting model that slashed loan approval times from weeks to just days. Areas of Expertise Product Strategy & Roadmap 0-to-1 Product Launch & GTM Fintech, Lending & Payments AI/ML in Product Management B2B & SaaS Platforms Agent Network Scaling Digital Transformation Stakeholder Management Beyond Product My passion for identifying underlying patterns extends beyond technology. As a history and geopolitics enthusiast, I'm fascinated by how global systems evolve-a perspective that informs my approach to building robust, future-proof products. This also takes the form of numismatics, where I collect stories of trade and empires, one coin at a time. I'm always open to discussing the future of AI in finance, building scalable products, or tackling the next big challenge in Fintech. Let's connect.

positions.subtitle: Manipal Fintech
positions.description: Currently leading the product charter at Manipal FinTech (formerly Sahi Bandhu), where I’ve built 0-to-1 digital platforms, scaled agent ecosystems, and redesigned mission-critical systems for onboarding, disbursal, and reconciliation. Key deliverablesLaunched a multi system Agent Lead generation Channel from scratch - scaled to 200+ field advisors within 3 months, generating over ₹15Cr ($2M+) in monthly disbursals.• Built Doorstep Banking integration with a leading private bank - added ₹2Cr/month in new loan volumes; resolved a systemic penalty logic bug, preserving compliance and trust.• Digitized onboarding through automated ID creation, KYC APIs, and workflow validation - reduced TAT from 2 hours to 45 mins, with 80% fewer errors.• Re-architected disbursal and reconciliation engines for the in-house NBFC - cut daily ops from 6 hours to 2 hours (automation pipeline targeting 30 mins).• Redesigned onboarding and disbursal flows, identifying key opportunities for AI-driven automation with the potential to reduce TAT by up to 70%• Proposed a scalable redesign of the database schema - enabled cross-platform traceability, reduced latency, and simplified change management.• Established agile product operations: implemented structured PRD workflows, built a centralized design system, and evangelized tools like Figma, Miro, and Notion.• Built and managed a 7-member cross-functional team (PMs & Designers) - embedded sprint rituals, backlog hygiene, and GTM cadence with business and tech.
positions.title: Head of Product
positions.description_html:
Currently leading the product charter at Manipal FinTech (formerly Sahi Bandhu), where I’ve built 0-to-1 digital platforms, scaled agent ecosystems, and redesigned mission-critical systems for onboarding, disbursal, and reconciliation. Key deliverables

Launched a multi system Agent Lead generation Channel from scratch - scaled to 200+ field advisors within 3 months, generating over ₹15Cr ($2M+) in monthly disbursals.
• Built Doorstep Banking integration with a leading private bank - added ₹2Cr/month in new loan volumes; resolved a systemic penalty logic bug, preserving compliance and trust.
• Digitized onboarding through automated ID creation, KYC APIs, and workflow validation - reduced TAT from 2 hours to 45 mins, with 80% fewer errors.
• Re-architected disbursal and reconciliation engines for the in-house NBFC - cut daily ops from 6 hours to 2 hours (automation pipeline targeting 30 mins).
• Redesigned onboarding and disbursal flows, identifying key opportunities for AI-driven automation with the potential to reduce TAT by up to 70%
• Proposed a scalable redesign of the database schema - enabled cross-platform traceability, reduced latency, and simplified change management.
• Established agile product operations: implemented structured PRD workflows, built a centralized design system, and evangelized tools like Figma, Miro, and Notion.
• Built and managed a 7-member cross-functional team (PMs & Designers) - embedded sprint rituals, backlog hygiene, and GTM cadence with business and tech.

experience.title: AVP, Product Manager
experience.description: • Owned product strategy, roadmap, and GTM execution for B2B enterprise SaaS platforms, including Accounts Payable (AP) Invoice Automation and Case Management• Shaped product vision and roadmap priorities by conducting in-depth user interviews with clients in the Consumer Goods & Retail sectors and performing continuous competitive analysis.• Drove a 15-20% increase in user productivity and satisfaction by spearheading a comprehensive UX revamp of the core Accounts Payable platform.• Defined modular product architecture and co-developed GTM strategies, cutting launch cycles by 66% on the Case Management platform• Conducted competitive analysis and market research to anticipate trends and shape product positioning• Designed ML algorithms for invoice auto-posting, increasing accuracy from 10% to 60% for a global car rental client — reducing manual effort by 40%• Built GRN flip mechanism for a leading hotel chain, improving auto-posting rates from 5% to 30% and streamlining reconciliation workflow
experience.description_html:
• Owned product strategy, roadmap, and GTM execution for B2B enterprise SaaS platforms, including Accounts Payable (AP) Invoice Automation and Case Management
• Shaped product vision and roadmap priorities by conducting in-depth user interviews with clients in the Consumer Goods & Retail sectors and performing continuous competitive analysis.
• Drove a 15-20% increase in user productivity and satisfaction by spearheading a comprehensive UX revamp of the core Accounts Payable platform.
• Defined modular product architecture and co-developed GTM strategies, cutting launch cycles by 66% on the Case Management platform
• Conducted competitive analysis and market research to anticipate trends and shape product positioning
• Designed ML algorithms for invoice auto-posting, increasing accuracy from 10% to 60% for a global car rental client — reducing manual effort by 40%
• Built GRN flip mechanism for a leading hotel chain, improving auto-posting rates from 5% to 30% and streamlining reconciliation workflow

recommendations: Kathleen Grasse, PMP, DASM, CP2P “Allan and I worked together on a 10-months long global transition project which involved designing, building, testing and implementation of a complex integration between an ERP system and a Payables workflow application. Under Allan`s excellent leadership, the integration was implemented successfully although he and his team had to work through a number of critical challenges. Despite those challenges, Allan displayed a very high level of customer service, professionalism and flexibility at all times. I was most impressed with his ability to mitigate risks, resolve issues and offer solutions tailored to my needs as his customer. Allan is a level-headed, knowledgeable professional, always willing to go the extra mile for his team and his clients. It was a pleasure to work with him. I wish Allan all the best for his future and have no doubt he will be a great asset to any team/organization.”

recommendations: Parag Samarth “I have known Amit for around 3 years when he was responsible for the App Dev and Platform engg practice. He took over from people who were very highly regarded by customers and colleagues. Amit stepped into some really big shoes and got comfortable in his role real fast, he gained customer confidence quickly and also the trust and faith of his colleagues. The real recognition was when a demanding client asked Amit to own the product he was supporting and was given a seat on the customer’s leadership team. Amit has a strong and hands on technical leadership, he is strong architecturally and a great leader of people. I am certain he will do well wherever he is and will be an asset to his management. ”

Michael Zimberg “I worked with Amit for 2+ years and highly recommend him based on many aspects including skills and attitude. He is a problem solver and really takes ownership of tasks, making sure they are done correctly with quality. He has strong architectural design skills and is an excellent hands-on technologist. Amit gets the best out of his team and I always look forward to collaborating with him. He also is always learning about the bleeding edge of tech innovation and often brings new good ideas as innovative solutions to complex problems.”

detailed_profile.name: Sylvester Domingo
detailed_profile.position: Digital Transformation , CX, Process Excellence, Audit & Compliance
detailed_profile.about: As Head Center of Excellence at Manipal Fintech, I leverage my years of experience in Digital strategy & transformation, operations and business management to drive growth and innovation in the fintech industry. I hold a Bachelor of Commerce degree from Calcutta University and a Certified ScrumMaster® certification from Scrum Alliance, ISO 9001 certified Internal Auditor & 6 Sigma Green Belt certifications, demonstrating my commitment to continuous learning and improvement. I have a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, implementing agile methodologies, and delivering high-quality results. My skills in digital strategy, scrum, and agile methodologies enable me to navigate complex challenges and opportunities in the dynamic fintech landscape. I am passionate about creating value for customers, stakeholders, and the organization as a whole.

posts.title: The Digital Space! Are we doing enough?

experience.title: AVP - Telesales Digital Strategy
experience.description: Currently heading the Digital Sales portfolio and Leading the initiative to set up a telecalling unit for the Organically routed Customers.  Introduced WFH Tele for SBI Card. With complete digital solutioning Plan and Execute GTM strategy for effective increase in sales penetration using digital technology Responsible for technology transition across locations, spanning over 4000 users.  Introduced fool proof security systems to make processes compliant across locations.  Created and deployed a rigorous Reporting and MIS process across these locations. Introducing & Developing digital one view dashboards for all locations.  Responsible for system integration with SBI Card core systems.  Responsible for creating a paperless environment for the channel, involves testing, giving inputs, UAT and GTM strategy. Heading the Process Excellence Unit for Telesales channel, 60+ sales units across the country. * Strategize Automation and Digitization:                  -Automation of Telesales force for the entire channel, Ensured seamless change management and transition management from a Manual environment to an automated set up. With a phase-wise, beta/production approach- Implemented Cloud based App dialers across 50 locations in 2 months, empowering 3000 users to  get digitized. Created a sales journey rather than just an automation of the workforce. Hit an adoption of 70% from the 2nd month of deployment.- Designed the one place centralized dashboard to view pan India reports at one click, with drill  down to the User Level. Available to all users starting the NSM till the Team Leader.- Currently working on a seamless fulfillment module for the sales unit.

-Automation of Telesales force for the entire channel, Ensured seamless change management and transition management from a Manual environment to an automated set up. With a phase-wise, beta/production approach

down to the User Level. Available to all users starting the NSM till the Team Leader.
- Currently working on a seamless fulfillment module for the sales unit.

basic_info.search_snippet: Saurabh Jha. Human Resources Professional | Driving People & Process Excellence | Passionate About Building Engaged, Productive Workforces. Manipal Fintech ...

detailed_profile.name: Saurabh Jha
detailed_profile.position: Human Resources Professional | Driving People & Process Excellence | Passionate About Building Engaged, Productive Workforces
detailed_profile.about: As a seasoned Human Resources Professional with over a decade of experience, I have dedicated my career to fostering inclusive, dynamic, and productive work environments. My expertise spans across HR Business Partner (HRBP) operations, Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) initiatives, recruitment, policy development, team leadership, change management, performance management systems (PMS), and compliance. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated a passion for people and a commitment to driving organizational success through strategic HR practices. I excel in building strong, engaged teams and implementing innovative HR solutions that align with business objectives. Key Highlights: HRBP Operations: Proven track record in aligning HR strategies with business goals to enhance organizational performance. DEI Initiatives: Deeply committed to promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion to create a more equitable workplace. Recruitment: Skilled in attracting, hiring, and retaining top talent across various industries. Policy Development: Expertise in crafting and implementing HR policies that support company culture and compliance. Team Handling: Strong leadership abilities with experience in managing and developing high-performing teams. Change Management: Adept at guiding organizations through change, ensuring smooth transitions and minimal disruption. Performance Management: Proficient in designing and executing effective performance management systems. Compliance: Thorough understanding of HR compliance and regulatory requirements to mitigate risks. My approach is centered on the belief that a happy and engaged workforce is the cornerstone of any successful organization. I am passionate about creating workplaces where employees feel valued, supported, and motivated to contribute their best. Let's connect and explore how I can help your organization achieve its HR goals and drive continuous improvement.

experience.description: As an Assistant Product Manager at the Manipal Group & Sahibandhu Fintech Services I have driven significant process improvements and innovation in the Gold Loan industry by designing an automated onboarding journey, reducing operational complexities, and enhancing risk mitigation measures.Key Contributions:Vendor Assessment & API Integration: Evaluated vendors and executed API integrations for OCR and document validation, eliminating manual verification and enabling seamless data capture and autofill within the sales application.Cross-functional Collaboration: Acted as a primary liaison between Sales, Operations, and Tech teams, facilitating alignment and comprehensive product documentation, including concept notes, business cases, and API criteria.Process Improvement & SOP Development: Spearheaded the formation of SOPs and process improvement initiatives within the product team, leveraging frameworks such as JTBD and Opportunity Analysis to enhance efficiency and drive value.Throughout my tenure, I have developed a strong foundation in product management, user-centric design, and data-driven decision-making. I am skilled in balancing operational efficiencies with customer satisfaction, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. My experiences have equipped me with the strategic insights and technical expertise required to drive product growth and customer success.
experience.description_html:
As an Assistant Product Manager at the Manipal Group & Sahibandhu Fintech Services I have driven significant process improvements and innovation in the Gold Loan industry by designing an automated onboarding journey, reducing operational complexities, and enhancing risk mitigation measures.

Key Contributions:

Vendor Assessment & API Integration: Evaluated vendors and executed API integrations for OCR and document validation, eliminating manual verification and enabling seamless data capture and autofill within the sales application.

Cross-functional Collaboration: Acted as a primary liaison between Sales, Operations, and Tech teams, facilitating alignment and comprehensive product documentation, including concept notes, business cases, and API criteria.

Process Improvement & SOP Development: Spearheaded the formation of SOPs and process improvement initiatives within the product team, leveraging frameworks such as JTBD and Opportunity Analysis to enhance efficiency and drive value.

Throughout my tenure, I have developed a strong foundation in product management, user-centric design, and data-driven decision-making. I am skilled in balancing operational efficiencies with customer satisfaction, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. My experiences have equipped me with the strategic insights and technical expertise required to drive product growth and customer success.

detailed_profile.name: Atul Shukla
detailed_profile.position: Gold Loan | Manipal Fintech ( The Manipal Group ) | BFSI Growth Strategist | 14+ Yrs in Retail Lending & Sales | Ex- IndiaGold | Ex-HDFC
detailed_profile.about: Accomplished and results-oriented professional with over 14 years of experience in the banking and financial services industry, with core expertise in gold loans, retail lending, sales strategy, and regional operations management. Proven track record of delivering consistent business growth, driving process improvements, and leading high-performing teams across diverse markets. Currently Looking - Gold Loan Doorstep at Manipal Fintech ( The Manipal Group ), I lead the strategic rollout and expansion of the doorstep gold loan model, ensuring seamless customer experience, operational efficiency, and market penetration. I oversee end-to-end business operations, sales performance, compliance, and team development to scale the model across multiple geographies. My career spans leadership roles at prestigious organizations like IndiaGold ,HDFC Bank , Vodafone , Hewlett Packard , where I successfully managed large teams, developed high-impact business strategies, and executed customer-centric initiatives that enhanced revenue and retention. I bring a unique blend of traditional banking experience and fintech innovation, enabling organizations to stay agile and competitive in the evolving financial landscape. Key Expertise: • Doorstep Gold Loan Operations • Sales Leadership & Business Development • Retail Lending & Financial Services • Team Building & Performance Management • Regional Strategy & Execution • Customer Experience & Compliance I am passionate about leveraging technology to enhance financial inclusion and am committed to driving growth through strategic leadership and innovation.

experience.title: Regional Head
experience.description: Key Responsibilities as Regional Head:	•	Spearheading operations across Delhi NCR, Lucknow, and Indore for Gold Loan business, ensuring efficient management and growth.	•	Leading a high-performing team comprising 1 Cluster Head, 3 Area Cluster Heads, 4 Team Leaders, 30 Loan Managers, 4 Sales Managers, and 6 Sales Executives to achieve organizational objectives.	•	Driving business growth with a monthly turnover of ₹12 crore and maintaining an AUM of ₹6 crore, while ensuring compliance with operational standards.	•	Strategizing and implementing market-focused plans to identify growth opportunities, expand market presence, and enhance product reach.	•	Focusing on new customer acquisition and optimizing balance transfer (BT) cases to scale business performance.	•	Collaborating effectively with Direct Sales Agents (DSAs) to strengthen market penetration and boost loan disbursals through targeted initiatives.
experience.description_html:
Key Responsibilities as Regional Head:
• Spearheading operations across Delhi NCR, Lucknow, and Indore for Gold Loan business, ensuring efficient management and growth.
• Leading a high-performing team comprising 1 Cluster Head, 3 Area Cluster Heads, 4 Team Leaders, 30 Loan Managers, 4 Sales Managers, and 6 Sales Executives to achieve organizational objectives.
• Driving business growth with a monthly turnover of ₹12 crore and maintaining an AUM of ₹6 crore, while ensuring compliance with operational standards.
• Strategizing and implementing market-focused plans to identify growth opportunities, expand market presence, and enhance product reach.
• Focusing on new customer acquisition and optimizing balance transfer (BT) cases to scale business performance.
• Collaborating effectively with Direct Sales Agents (DSAs) to strengthen market penetration and boost loan disbursals through targeted initiatives.

experience.description_html:
• Administered sales & marketing of PPS range of products including Laser Jet Printers, Inkjet Printers, Notebooks, and Accessories business for Uttarakhand;
• Targeted markets through a network of 4 distributors and 78 HP resellers in the state
• Selected as a Best Sales Person – Accessories by registering 17 lakhs sales in Oct’13
• Pivotal in making Uttarakhand as the Best Accessories Selling State PAN India; increased run rate sales of 12 Lac per month from an average of 5 Lakhs
• Registered highest growth in printer business for upcountry region by achieving 1400 units in March
• Penetrated HP business by appointing new dealers in up country terrains of Uttarakhand; explored business from new geographies like Gopeshwar, Karanpryag, Bageshwar, Vikas Nagar
• Augmented business for Notebooks, Printers & Accessories from Kotdwar, Srinagar, Udhamsingh Nagar, Pitthoragarh

projects.title: NYC Taxi and Limousine Commission Data Analysis
projects.description: • Analyzed over 2 million lines of data to determine underlying patterns affecting fare and tip amount of customers.• Performed EDA to isolate the 4 most correlated variables and conducted t-tests to confirm the hypothesis via significance level.• Built a linear regression model to uncover the factors affecting trips and customer reviews with an accuracy of 83.6%.• Engineered a prediction machine learning model with random forest and xgb boost to get an accuracy of 67.2%.

projects.title: Z Unlocked Challenge by HP
projects.description: • Task 1 (Data Viz) - Wrangled land cover, forest fire, waste disposal, temperature change, and energy emissions data to visualize global deforestation patterns across the world.• Task 2 (NLP) - Augmented a machine learning model using nltk, wordcloud, gensim to scour the internet via keyword extraction and implemented LDA - Latent Dirichlet Allocation to uncover distribution of topics at an accuracy of 74.2%.• Task 3 (Audio Classifier) - Constructed a tensorflow/keras model using pydub to analyze sound recordings of capuchin birds and predicted forest areas with the greatest density of the species with 78.4% accuracy.• Task 4 (Image Classifier) - Applied CNN and transfer learning model using opencv to train the model on stored images and classified similar kinds of images on the internet with an acc. of 84%.

projects.title: Time Series Forecasting for Olist Brazil
projects.description: • Developed a time-series forecasting model using the ARIMA technique to analyze and predict future sales trends for various product categories available in Olist Superstore in Brazil.• Leveraged historical sales data to identify trends in the time series over 4 years of data and predict the future sales outcome with 76% accuracy.• Uncovered underlying patterns and seasonal variations in sales data using Tableau and Seaborn, providing valuable insights into consumer behavior for future sales, and enabling informed decision-making.

organizations.title: SRIJAN - The Fine Arts Society
organizations.description: • Organized workshops, exhibitions, events, and organized activities to foster cultural diversity among participants.• Collaborated with artists, faculty, and students to curate engaging art showcases and cultural programs.• Managed a team of members to ensure smooth event operations and efficient resource allocation.• Handled event logistics, including venue booking, budget planning, and vendor coordination.

basic_info.name: Animesh Kumar - Sales & Operations Leader
basic_info.search_snippet: Animesh Kumar. Sales & Operations Leader. Manipal Fintech Indian Institute of Management Bangalore. Gurugram, Haryana, India.

detailed_profile.name: Animesh Kumar
detailed_profile.position: Sales & Operations Leader
detailed_profile.about: A seasoned Business Head with over 14 years of experience in corporate sales, business development, and strategic operations. My career has been dedicated to driving business growth and operational efficiency while fostering strong client relationships. I thrive in dynamic environments where I can leverage my expertise in credit risk management and relationship management to create innovative solutions that enhance organizational performance. Throughout my career, I have successfully navigated multifaceted roles, leading high-performing teams and implementing strategies that deliver measurable results. I am particularly proud of my ability to reduce turnaround times by 75% through automation in the underwriting process and maintaining delinquency rates below 0.5% through effective risk management frameworks. Key Achievements: - Spearheaded the development of a fully digital lending ecosystem for unsecured personal loans, significantly improving operational efficiency. - Successfully built strategic partnerships with over 15 financial institutions, enhancing the company’s digital financial marketplace. - Achieved a remarkable 25% YoY growth in asset book while managing a diversified credit portfolio exceeding ₹2,500 Cr.

experience.title: Head - Operations & BPR
experience.description: In my current role, I lead the underwriting, regulatory compliance, and centralizedoperations for a next-gen lending platform. I am responsible for architecting data-driven credit riskframeworks and underwriting policies that align with our risk appetite. My focus is on ensuring operational scalability and governance across the lending workflow while . I also spearhead enterprise-level Business Process Re-engineering initiatives to streamline workflows and enhance customer lifecycle management.Achievements: I successfully led the development of a fully digital lending ecosystem for unsecuredpersonal loans, managed a team of 12 across various functions, and implemented a paperlessonboarding process that significantly improved turnaround time. Additionally, I introduced automationin the underwriting process, reducing manual interventions by 50% and enhancing accuracy in creditdecisioning.
experience.description_html:
In my current role, I lead the underwriting, regulatory compliance, and centralized
operations for a next-gen lending platform. I am responsible for architecting data-driven credit risk
frameworks and underwriting policies that align with our risk appetite.
My focus is on ensuring operational scalability and governance across the lending workflow while . I also spearhead enterprise-level Business Process Re-engineering initiatives to streamline workflows and enhance customer lifecycle management.
Achievements: I successfully led the development of a fully digital lending ecosystem for unsecured
personal loans, managed a team of 12 across various functions, and implemented a paperless
onboarding process that significantly improved turnaround time. Additionally, I introduced automation
in the underwriting process, reducing manual interventions by 50% and enhancing accuracy in credit
decisioning.

experience.title: Head - Business Development and Partner Relations
experience.description: As a key member of the CXO suite, I supported capital infusion strategies and scaledfinancial inclusion ecosystems. I led national-level strategic partnerships and business developmentfor three verticals, cultivating alliances with over 15 banks, NBFCs, and fintechs. My role involveddirecting operations while managing a 15-member team and launching innovative products toenhance our digital financial marketplace.Achievements: I successfully built a digital lending ecosystem from scratch, enabling seamless loandisbursals and onboarding processes. I also transformed the underwriting landscape throughinnovative training programs and developed strategic partnerships that increased fundingopportunities for the organization.
experience.description_html:
As a key member of the CXO suite, I supported capital infusion strategies and scaled
financial inclusion ecosystems. I led national-level strategic partnerships and business development
for three verticals, cultivating alliances with over 15 banks, NBFCs, and fintechs. My role involved
directing operations while managing a 15-member team and launching innovative products to
enhance our digital financial marketplace.
Achievements: I successfully built a digital lending ecosystem from scratch, enabling seamless loan
disbursals and onboarding processes. I also transformed the underwriting landscape through
innovative training programs and developed strategic partnerships that increased funding
opportunities for the organization.

detailed_profile.name: Quentin Passanha
detailed_profile.position: Senior Executive - Human Resource @ Manipal Technologies Limited
detailed_profile.about: As an Executive - Human Resource at Manipal Technologies Limited, I am responsible for hiring and recruiting the best talent for the company. I have developed strong skills in sourcing and screening, the candidates. I am passionate about creating a positive and inclusive work culture that aligns with the company's mission, vision, and values.

positions.subtitle: Manipal Technologies Limited
positions.description: - Lead full-cycle recruitment processes, including sourcing, screening and scheduling interviews for the candidates with hiring managers, successfully filling over vacancies across various departments, including IT, Marketing, Sales, Finance & Accounts, Production, Human Resource, Research & Development, Operations, Logistics, Supply Chain etc. - Develop and maintain strong relationships with hiring managers to understand their strategic hiring needs.- Implemented innovative sourcing strategies that increased the quality of candidate pipelines, utilizing platforms for job postings like LinkedIn and Naukri.com.-Liaise with external background check agencies and initiate background investigations on potential hires, including criminal history, credit checks, reference verifications, education verification, identity check and home address verification.- Conducted salary negotiation with the candidates, ensuring competitive offers that improved acceptance rates.- Provided mentorship and training to HR interns, fostering a collaborative team environment and enhancing overall team performance.
positions.title: Senior Executive - Human Resource
positions.description_html:
- Lead full-cycle recruitment processes, including sourcing, screening and scheduling interviews for the candidates with hiring managers, successfully filling over vacancies across various departments, including IT, Marketing, Sales, Finance & Accounts, Production, Human Resource, Research & Development, Operations, Logistics, Supply Chain etc.
- Develop and maintain strong relationships with hiring managers to understand their strategic hiring needs.
- Implemented innovative sourcing strategies that increased the quality of candidate pipelines, utilizing platforms for job postings like LinkedIn and Naukri.com.
-Liaise with external background check agencies and initiate background investigations on potential hires, including criminal history, credit checks, reference verifications, education verification, identity check and home address verification.
- Conducted salary negotiation with the candidates, ensuring competitive offers that improved acceptance rates.
- Provided mentorship and training to HR interns, fostering a collaborative team environment and enhancing overall team performance.

detailed_profile.name: Deiva Bindhiya
detailed_profile.position: Bilingual Content Curator | Tamil & English Content Specialist
detailed_profile.about: A proficient Tamil content writer, I craft words with cultural nuance and linguistic flair. My expertise lies in crafting engaging content that captivates readers. From creative storytelling to informative articles, I bring the essence of Tamil language and culture to life, delivering impactful and compelling narratives.

experience.title: Content Specialist
experience.description: Crafting strategic content to drive engagement, visibility, and business growth across Manipal’s diversified portfolio.As part of the core marketing team, I contribute to brand communication and content creation across multiple entities under the Manipal Group, including Manipal Business Solutions (MBS), Manipal Technologies (MTL), Manipal Fintech Services (MFS), and MPi.Key Responsibilities:🔹 Social Media CopywritingWriting creative, engaging post copies to boost visibility and interaction across LinkedIn and other digital platforms.Tailoring messaging to suit varied audiences while maintaining brand consistency across group companies.🔹 Marketing Material DevelopmentDelivering stakeholder-approved content for brochures, pamphlets, flyers, and other promotional assets.Ensuring each piece aligns with brand tone and campaign objectives.🔹 Blog Writing & SEOCreating insightful blog content to enhance organic traffic.Applying SEO best practices to support discoverability and relevance in search rankings.🔹 Website Revamp ContentLeading content development for website restructuring projects.Ensuring a user-friendly, informative, and updated online brand presence.🔹 Public Relations ContentDrafting PR media quotes, articles, and standalone stories that align with brand positioning.Supporting external communication efforts to build thought leadership and brand credibility.This role enables me to blend creativity with strategy, building content that informs, engages, and inspires action across digital and traditional channels.
experience.description_html:
Crafting strategic content to drive engagement, visibility, and business growth across Manipal’s diversified portfolio.

As part of the core marketing team, I contribute to brand communication and content creation across multiple entities under the Manipal Group, including Manipal Business Solutions (MBS), Manipal Technologies (MTL), Manipal Fintech Services (MFS), and MPi.

Key Responsibilities:

🔹 Social Media Copywriting

Writing creative, engaging post copies to boost visibility and interaction across LinkedIn and other digital platforms.

Tailoring messaging to suit varied audiences while maintaining brand consistency across group companies.

🔹 Marketing Material Development

Delivering stakeholder-approved content for brochures, pamphlets, flyers, and other promotional assets.

Ensuring each piece aligns with brand tone and campaign objectives.

🔹 Blog Writing & SEO

Creating insightful blog content to enhance organic traffic.

Applying SEO best practices to support discoverability and relevance in search rankings.

🔹 Website Revamp Content

Leading content development for website restructuring projects.

Ensuring a user-friendly, informative, and updated online brand presence.

🔹 Public Relations Content

Drafting PR media quotes, articles, and standalone stories that align with brand positioning.

Supporting external communication efforts to build thought leadership and brand credibility.

This role enables me to blend creativity with strategy, building content that informs, engages, and inspires action across digital and traditional channels.

experience.title: Content Manager
experience.description: At Manipal Fintech (formerly SahiBandhu), I led high-impact content and communication initiatives that shaped the brand’s identity and amplified its market presence. My work spanned across digital, social media, print, and PR—delivering content that aligned with business goals and resonated with diverse audiences.Key Responsibilities:🔹 Brand & Content StrategyDeveloped cohesive brand narratives and crafted compelling USPs to differentiate the brand in the fintech and gold-tech space.Built and executed digital content strategies across platforms including social media, website, app store, and ad channels.🔹 Content Creation (English & Tamil)Created engaging content for blogs, social media, ad creatives, festive campaigns, and Google Ads.Managed and updated web content, including regional blogs and festival/offer-related materials.Supported both real-time moment marketing and long-form storytelling.🔹 PR & CommunicationsAuthored PR articles, media quotes, press releases, standalone and industry stories, and interview content.Contributed to brand visibility through media profiling and thought leadership pieces.🔹 Marketing CollateralsWrote copy for pamphlets, bank emailers, field sales flyers, posters, and referral campaigns.Managed content translation and localization across 5+ languages for wider regional impact.This role allowed me to bridge storytelling with strategy, helping position Manipal Fintech as a credible and customer-focused brand in the evolving financial landscape.
experience.description_html:
At Manipal Fintech (formerly SahiBandhu), I led high-impact content and communication initiatives that shaped the brand’s identity and amplified its market presence. My work spanned across digital, social media, print, and PR—delivering content that aligned with business goals and resonated with diverse audiences.

Key Responsibilities:

🔹 Brand & Content Strategy

Developed cohesive brand narratives and crafted compelling USPs to differentiate the brand in the fintech and gold-tech space.

Built and executed digital content strategies across platforms including social media, website, app store, and ad channels.

🔹 Content Creation (English & Tamil)

Created engaging content for blogs, social media, ad creatives, festive campaigns, and Google Ads.

Managed and updated web content, including regional blogs and festival/offer-related materials.

Supported both real-time moment marketing and long-form storytelling.

🔹 PR & Communications

Authored PR articles, media quotes, press releases, standalone and industry stories, and interview content.

Contributed to brand visibility through media profiling and thought leadership pieces.

🔹 Marketing Collaterals

Wrote copy for pamphlets, bank emailers, field sales flyers, posters, and referral campaigns.

Managed content translation and localization across 5+ languages for wider regional impact.

This role allowed me to bridge storytelling with strategy, helping position Manipal Fintech as a credible and customer-focused brand in the evolving financial landscape.

experience.title: Sub Editor
experience.description: Spearheaded content creation and editing initiatives at Krishi Jagran, a leading agricultural platform, driving impactful communication across diverse channels.Key Responsibilities:Content Creation: Crafted high-quality, SEO-optimized Tamil content for news, farming practices, government schemes, gardening, health & lifestyle, animal husbandry, success stories, and other relevant blog topics. Conducted in-depth research to ensure accuracy and provide valuable insights to the target audience.Content Editing: Refined and enhanced articles contributed by Tamil Nadu Agriculture University, ensuring clarity, conciseness, and adherence to editorial standards.Translation & Adaptation: Translated English articles into engaging Tamil content, effectively conveying key messages and maintaining the original intent.Script Development: Developed compelling scripts for YouTube channels, enhancing audience engagement and brand visibility.Team Leadership: Led and mentored a team of 3 Tamil content creators, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment.
experience.description_html:
Spearheaded content creation and editing initiatives at Krishi Jagran, a leading agricultural platform, driving impactful communication across diverse channels.

Key Responsibilities:

Content Creation: Crafted high-quality, SEO-optimized Tamil content for news, farming practices, government schemes, gardening, health & lifestyle, animal husbandry, success stories, and other relevant blog topics. Conducted in-depth research to ensure accuracy and provide valuable insights to the target audience.
Content Editing: Refined and enhanced articles contributed by Tamil Nadu Agriculture University, ensuring clarity, conciseness, and adherence to editorial standards.
Translation & Adaptation: Translated English articles into engaging Tamil content, effectively conveying key messages and maintaining the original intent.
Script Development: Developed compelling scripts for YouTube channels, enhancing audience engagement and brand visibility.
Team Leadership: Led and mentored a team of 3 Tamil content creators, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: As a seasoned Gold Loan Product Manager, I have successfully driven multiple initiatives to enhance product offerings and streamline operational processes. My expertise lies in developing and integrating robust systems that improve efficiency and customer experience.Key Responsibilities and Achievements:-Commission Engine Development :Spearheaded the development & implementation of a sophisticated commission engine, ensuring accurate and timely calculations of commission payments for sales teams.- Internal Document Verification Portal:Led the creation of an internal document verification portal that streamlined the loan approval process. This reduced verification time by 40%, improving overall customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.- CRM Integration:Successfully integrated a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system to centralize customer data and streamline communication. This integration facilitated better customer insights and more personalized service offerings.- Vendor Management & Agreement Signing:Managed vendor relationships and negotiated agreements to ensure the highest quality services and favorable terms. - Ticketing Tool Integration:Implemented a ticketing tool for better issue tracking and resolution management. This integration improved response times by 30% and provided valuable data for continuous process improvement.
experience.description_html:
As a seasoned Gold Loan Product Manager, I have successfully driven multiple initiatives to enhance product offerings and streamline operational processes. My expertise lies in developing and integrating robust systems that improve efficiency and customer experience.

Key Responsibilities and Achievements:

-Commission Engine Development :Spearheaded the development & implementation of a sophisticated commission engine, ensuring accurate and timely calculations of commission payments for sales teams.

- Internal Document Verification Portal:Led the creation of an internal document verification portal that streamlined the loan approval process. This reduced verification time by 40%, improving overall customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

- CRM Integration:Successfully integrated a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system to centralize customer data and streamline communication. This integration facilitated better customer insights and more personalized service offerings.

- Vendor Management & Agreement Signing:Managed vendor relationships and negotiated agreements to ensure the highest quality services and favorable terms.

- Ticketing Tool Integration:Implemented a ticketing tool for better issue tracking and resolution management. This integration improved response times by 30% and provided valuable data for continuous process improvement.

experience.title: Business Head – Prepaid Cards & Digital Wallet
experience.description: Transcorp was principal agent of Western Union since 1997 and provide Money Exchange and Money Transfer services. It has been licensed by RBI as an Authorised Dealer Category II and in this business since 1994. Transcorp is also into tours and travel business through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Ritco Travels. Transcorp has a network with more than 40 own branches across the country and more than 8000 distribution network. In Aug’16, Transcorp was also accorded PPI license by RBI to issue & operate prepaid payment system in India.Roles & ResponsibilitiesAs head of business for this new line of business in Transcorp, responsible for creating the brand, setting up the business of prepaid cards & digital wallets. - Creation of framework for the prepaid business and product development.- Strategic alliances with Banks, Financial Institutions, NPCI for designing & finalizing the product - Technology/Product alliances with platform developers, payment processors, device manufacturers & aggregators. - Business Alliances with large merchants, merchant aggregators & POS companies. - Finalize and institutionalize process, policies and operative procedures. - Building the business plan and models for finalization in consultation with the board. - Hiring, developing and building the team and ensure consistent performance delivery. - Strategic planning and implementation for meeting the budgets.
experience.description_html:
Transcorp was principal agent of Western Union since 1997 and provide Money Exchange and Money Transfer services. It has been licensed by RBI as an Authorised Dealer Category II and in this business since 1994. Transcorp is also into tours and travel business through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Ritco Travels. Transcorp has a network with more than 40 own branches across the country and more than 8000 distribution network. In Aug’16, Transcorp was also accorded PPI license by RBI to issue & operate prepaid payment system in India.

Roles & Responsibilities
As head of business for this new line of business in Transcorp, responsible for creating the brand, setting up the business of prepaid cards & digital wallets.
- Creation of framework for the prepaid business and product development.
- Strategic alliances with Banks, Financial Institutions, NPCI for designing & finalizing the product
- Technology/Product alliances with platform developers, payment processors, device manufacturers & aggregators.
- Business Alliances with large merchants, merchant aggregators & POS companies.
- Finalize and institutionalize process, policies and operative procedures.
- Building the business plan and models for finalization in consultation with the board.
- Hiring, developing and building the team and ensure consistent performance delivery.
- Strategic planning and implementation for meeting the budgets.

experience.title: GM & Head - Merchant Acquisition & Alliances (MoboMoney)
experience.description: MoboMoney is a RBI-licensed prepaid wallet which uses NFC (Near Field Communication) technology to facilitate digital payments. It is the prepaid instrument in India which enables over the counter payments for goods and services, akin to a credit / debit card. MoboMoney also has an aggregation of services including VAS, Canteen & Parking solutions.Roles & Responsibilities•	Build the Merchant Business strategy and lead the execution including engagement models•	Ownership for Merchant Business Development, Retail Neighborhood Market Rollout.•	Conceptualizing, finalizing & managing banking/financial & strategic alliances•	Plan, monitor and manage execution of activities to enhance wallet transactions/activations•	Lead the overall product with improvement/establishment of key process. Participate in lead strategy, policy formulation and business case finalization•	Implement the strategic goals of the organization through day-to-day management of operations•	Ensure all Statutory & Regulatory Compliances in Operations (RBI & General Law of Land)
experience.description_html:
MoboMoney is a RBI-licensed prepaid wallet which uses NFC (Near Field Communication) technology to facilitate digital payments. It is the prepaid instrument in India which enables over the counter payments for goods and services, akin to a credit / debit card. MoboMoney also has an aggregation of services including VAS, Canteen & Parking solutions.

Roles & Responsibilities
• Build the Merchant Business strategy and lead the execution including engagement models
• Ownership for Merchant Business Development, Retail Neighborhood Market Rollout.
• Conceptualizing, finalizing & managing banking/financial & strategic alliances
• Plan, monitor and manage execution of activities to enhance wallet transactions/activations
• Lead the overall product with improvement/establishment of key process. Participate in lead strategy, policy formulation and business case finalization
• Implement the strategic goals of the organization through day-to-day management of operations
• Ensure all Statutory & Regulatory Compliances in Operations (RBI & General Law of Land)

experience.title: Regional Head (North & East) - Partnerships Acquisition & Retention
experience.description: Loylty Rewardz is India's Premier Loyalty & Rewards management company which offers bespoke services related to development and management of consumer loyalty, analytics, data intelligence and direct marketing communication. It has grown exponentially into one of the largest consumer relationship management and behavior analytics companies in IndiaRoles & Responsibilities•	Acquisition & Servicing of mid to large sized retail organizations into our multi-currency consumer commerce platform called Max Get More.•	Devise and deploy appropriate rewards and recognition mechanisms and use state-of-the-art tools, technology & data intelligence to influence consumer behavior in a way that is beneficial to the banks, our retail partners and most importantly, the consumers themselves•	Charting out marketing strategies and setting up distribution networks enhancing business volumes & growth and achieving revenue & profitability•	Providing Solution to Merchants to enhance their business with Loyalty Programs and CRM•	Monitoring partnership performance and gap analysis, conceptualization and execution of the communication strategy to address the specific requirements of the partners•	Alliances & account management of partner banks based in the region for card loyalty program
experience.description_html:
Loylty Rewardz is India's Premier Loyalty & Rewards management company which offers bespoke services related to development and management of consumer loyalty, analytics, data intelligence and direct marketing communication. It has grown exponentially into one of the largest consumer relationship management and behavior analytics companies in India

Roles & Responsibilities
• Acquisition & Servicing of mid to large sized retail organizations into our multi-currency consumer commerce platform called Max Get More.
• Devise and deploy appropriate rewards and recognition mechanisms and use state-of-the-art tools, technology & data intelligence to influence consumer behavior in a way that is beneficial to the banks, our retail partners and most importantly, the consumers themselves
• Charting out marketing strategies and setting up distribution networks enhancing business volumes & growth and achieving revenue & profitability
• Providing Solution to Merchants to enhance their business with Loyalty Programs and CRM
• Monitoring partnership performance and gap analysis, conceptualization and execution of the communication strategy to address the specific requirements of the partners
• Alliances & account management of partner banks based in the region for card loyalty program

experience.title: Zonal Head, Merchant Services
experience.description: Roles & Responsibilities•	Managing all Sales/BD functions & Service Operations of the zone •	Merchant Acquisition & Key Alliances, New product rollouts, National Merchants Management, Service delivery & managing regional merchant service call center•	Managing Outbound & Inbound Telecallers Team to resolve customer related issues with CRM•	Managing terminal Stock, Merchant Chargeback Operations and Retrieval for the zone•	Managing the budget & cost/profit responsibility of the zone
experience.description_html:
Roles & Responsibilities
• Managing all Sales/BD functions & Service Operations of the zone
• Merchant Acquisition & Key Alliances, New product rollouts, National Merchants Management, Service delivery & managing regional merchant service call center
• Managing Outbound & Inbound Telecallers Team to resolve customer related issues with CRM
• Managing terminal Stock, Merchant Chargeback Operations and Retrieval for the zone
• Managing the budget & cost/profit responsibility of the zone

recommendations: Srijit Murthy “Having worked with Sathish for 2 years, I must say he is an excellent professional. He has a positive attitude towards any situation that may arise with a solution mindset. I am impressed by his work ethic and communication skills. He easily adjusts to any given situation or business dynamics. What makes him stand out is his willingness to help others. I am glad to have worked with him and wish him luck and success in all his future endeavours.”

Saurabh Gomase “I had the privilege of working closely with Satish Kumar sir, the talent transformation Manager at Jobdost, during a recent hiring engagement for several high-priority IT roles. From the initial discussions to final onboarding, Satish sir demonstrated an exceptional ability to understand our business needs, translate them into actionable talent strategies, and deliver with speed and precision. What sets Satish sir apart is not just industry expertise in staff augmentation, but a genuine commitment to building lasting partnerships. He/She consistently provided top-tier candidates, proactively communicated at every stage, and ensured seamless coordination between our internal stakeholders and the recruitment team. In an industry where responsiveness and reliability make all the difference, Satish Kumar sir leads by example. His/Her leadership has clearly shaped a high-performing team that is both agile and client-focused. I wholeheartedly recommend Satish Kumar sir for any organization looking for a strategic partner in workforce solutions. A true professional who brings insight, integrity, and impact to every engagement. ”

detailed_profile.name: Rishi Ranjan
detailed_profile.position: Engineer Turned PGDM Student | Analytics & Operations Enthusiast | Former BDA
detailed_profile.about: With a bachelor's degree in electrical engineering and a PGDM specialization in analytics and operations, I have developed a strong foundation in both technical and business domains. My transition from engineering to business development has helped me build analytical thinking, strategic decision-making, and client relationship management skills. As a senior business development associate at Testbook and a business development associate at BYJU'S, I contributed to market research, sales strategy, and client engagement, playing a role in revenue growth and business expansion. Additionally, I leveraged my Tableau expertise to create insightful reports and dashboards, supporting data-driven decision-making for internal and external stakeholders. Currently pursuing my PGDM at Sparsh Global Business School, I am further enhancing my expertise in operations and analytics. My role as the sports head has given me hands-on experience in budgeting, event planning, and team coordination, strengthening my ability to manage operations efficiently. I am now looking to transition into an operations role, where I can apply my problem-solving, data analysis, and process optimization skills to improve efficiency and drive innovation. As a fast learner and adaptable professional, I thrive in dynamic environments and am eager to contribute meaningful solutions to organizations.

detailed_profile.position: Assistant Vice President @ Yucollect | P&L Ownership & GTM Strategy | Senior Sales Leader with experience at Khatabook, BharatPe, PhonePe, GPI and Vodafone
detailed_profile.about: I am a strategic and impact-driven sales leader with 8.5+ years of experience across fintech, FMCG, and telecom sectors, consistently driving multimillion-dollar revenue growth across early-stage startups and enterprise environments. My core strength lies in building high-performance sales engines from scratch, leading large regional teams, and owning end-to-end P&L responsibilities. I've led Gujarat’s business verticals at Khatabook and BharatPe, expanded merchant onboarding pipelines at PhonePe, and executed GTM strategies in highly competitive markets. Proven record in scaling revenue and optimising team performance in fintech-led ecosystems Deep experience in merchant acquisition, collections, digital lending, and sales operations Skilled at stakeholder collaboration, training, and expansion strategy across Tier 2 and Tier 3 markets Committed to result-driven leadership and hands-on execution As an AVP, I am currently working toward senior leadership roles by contributing to business transformation, leading multi-regional teams, and delivering high-impact growth.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: As a Data Science Intern at Manipal Fintech, I focused on developing data-driven solutions to identify and retain repeat customers. I improved data quality by implementing enhanced validation checks, reducing processing time through automation. I built an interactive Plotly dashboard to track customer retention with customer segmentation based on various metrics. I developed a repeat customer prediction model as well. Additionally, I created a Streamlit-based UI to deliver personalized gold loan quotes, saving man hours.

experience.title: Undergraduate Researcher
experience.description: As an undergraduate researcher, I focused on applying system identification techniques to finance, particularly in market making, order execution, and pair trading. My work involved analyzing market dynamics and order flow to develop adaptive strategies that enhance trading efficiency. By bridging control theory and financial applications, I aimed to optimize decision-making processes and contribute to more robust trading systems.

experience.title: Artificial Intelligence Intern
experience.description: I developed a comprehensive electricity demand forecasting system for Andhra Pradesh by building a reliable data pipeline to fetch daily meteorological data and designing region-specific Bidirectional LSTM models that accounted for temperature, rainfall, and festivals. The models achieved high accuracy, with a Mean Percentage Error of just 0.04. To make the forecasts easily accessible, I deployed them through a Streamlit-based web app, enabling stakeholders to make informed, data-driven decisions for efficient energy management and reduced power shortages.

experience.company: IIT Kharagpur AI4ICPS I Hub Foundation

experience.title: Data Modeling Lead
experience.description: As part of a predictive modeling team focused on quantifying the skill gap in the Indian tech job market, I led initiatives to assess and bridge this divide by developing an importance-weighted skill corpus and a baseline model for evaluating skill relevance. Enhancing this framework, I integrated BERT-based embeddings with cosine similarity, achieving a 26% improvement over existing models. I also proposed leveraging knowledge graphs and the YouTube API to recommend targeted upskilling resources. These efforts aimed to deliver actionable insights and support recent graduates in aligning their skills with industry demands.

Enhancing this framework, I integrated BERT-based embeddings with cosine similarity, achieving a 26% improvement over existing models. I also proposed leveraging knowledge graphs and the YouTube API to recommend targeted upskilling resources. These efforts aimed to deliver actionable insights and support recent graduates in aligning their skills with industry demands.

positions.subtitle: Communiqué IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: As Secretary of Communiqué, I was part of a passionate team dedicated to supporting the personality and career development of IIT Kharagpur students. We organized key events like Internship Gear-Up and Placement Drives to help pre-final and final year students secure top internships and jobs. Our initiatives included seminars on CAT, UPSC, deferred MBA, group discussions, and personal interviews, as well as national-level tests and blog posts sharing insights from seniors across diverse career paths. We also conducted case studies, communication skill workshops, and career exploration sessions. Leading the recruitment and training of 36 associates, I focused on fostering clarity and confidence in communication. My time at Communiqué was an incredibly rewarding experience, working with an inspiring team to create one of the most vibrant student communities on campus.

volunteer_experience.info: During my tenure at the National Social Service, I actively engaged in disseminating crucial information concerning state and national initiatives aimed at enhancing financial literacy among underprivileged communities. This involved conducting informative online presentations elucidating the procedures for accessing loans pertinent to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), agricultural financing, and similar programs. Additionally, I organized an online webinar focusing on the significance… Show more During my tenure at the National Social Service, I actively engaged in disseminating crucial information concerning state and national initiatives aimed at enhancing financial literacy among underprivileged communities. This involved conducting informative online presentations elucidating the procedures for accessing loans pertinent to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), agricultural financing, and similar programs. Additionally, I organized an online webinar focusing on the significance of PAN cards for rural residents.Moreover, I curated a comprehensive directory of essential contacts encompassing healthcare services, food assistance, and other miscellaneous resources to aid the residents of my region. Concurrently, I participated in numerous online workshops, addressing topics such as COVID-19 safety measures, the importance of maintaining optimal physical and mental health. I endeavored to disseminate awareness within the local populace, with a particular emphasis on the younger demographic. Show less

I dedicated time to offering guidance regarding their coursework, aiding in understanding complex subjects, and providing valuable insights to navigate the academic challenges they encountered.Beyond academics, I took a proactive role in introducing them to campus groups and extracurricular activities. By familiarizing them with different groups and opportunities available within the campus community, I aimed to help them establish connections and find their niche within the broader university environment.Moreover, I extended my support beyond the academic realm, offering guidance on career prospects and personal development. I provided advice on career paths, internship opportunities, and personal growth strategies, aiming to equip them with the necessary tools to navigate their future professional endeavors.My commitment as a mentor was not only to assist with immediate academic needs but also to foster their holistic growth, ensuring that they felt supported and empowered throughout their initial year in college. experience.title: Founding Partner

I also regularly undertake commercial negotiations on behalf of my clients.We also appear as counsel/s in arbitration and litigation matters across various forums including NCLT, NCLAT, High Courts, ITAT and The Supreme Court of India etc.
experience.description_html:
I work for a full service corporate law firm which provides transaction and advisory services related to private equity, joint ventures, mergers and acquisitions, inbound-outbound foreign investments. I also regularly undertake commercial negotiations on behalf of my clients.

We also appear as counsel/s in arbitration and litigation matters across various forums including NCLT, NCLAT, High Courts, ITAT and The Supreme Court of India etc.

experience.title: Honarary Director
experience.description: Bridge Policy Think Tank is a Public Policy Advisory & Research, Advocacy, Capacity Building and Conflict Management organisation. We assist ministries in drafting legislations based on statistical data research, global best practices. We are one of the pioneers in organized civil and commercial mediation, policy advisor, think tank and training in India. We assist organisations for institutionalisation of ADR services, setting up, operating and scaling up ADR centres providing arbitration, mediation, conciliation and neutral evaluation services. Some of our other services include assistance in developing in-house processes for pre-litigation, confidential dispute resolution and conflict coaching for employees and teams. We design and implement internal or external dispute resolution systems or grievance mechanisms that allow companies to know when problems arise and address them at the lowest level possible. We assist infrastructure companies in right of way negotiations, brand building and sustainable community development in long term projects.

publications.title: Third Party Funding of Dispute Resolution
publications.subtitle: Eastern Book Company https://www.ebcwebstore.com/product/third-party-funding-of-dispute-resolution-by-kritika-krishnamurthy-and-anuroop-omkar?products_id=99101844
publications.description: This book takes a holistic approach to third-party funding in India and has something for everyone, from the practitioners and adjudicators to arbitration counsels or arbitrators engaged in an arbitration with third-party funding. For funders and claimants seeking funding, business models and foreign investment options in India, funding structures, case assessment and due diligence perspectives have been covered. For policy and lawmakers, the policy aspects of regulating or not regulating third-party funding in India from a ”to be or not to be” perspective has been taken up by the authors. Lastly, this book discusses an interdisciplinary approach of looking at third-party funding from an outside-of-law view of conflicts including neuroscience, human habits and the economic perspective of risks and costs. The authors have tried to keep the writing style as simple and lucid as possible with relatable stories so that the reader is able to link the concepts with real life. Case studies and what-if scenarios inboxes have been included through the book as not much is available in public domain on this subject.

publications.title: Book- The Art of Negotiation & Mediation- "A wishbone, a funny bone and a backbone" Second Edition
publications.subtitle: LexisNexis (A Division of Reed Elsevier India Pvt Ltd)
publications.description: Disputes happen. They are as inevitable as death and taxes. you can try to avoid them, pretend they do not exist, try and bully your way out of them but one thing is certain- there is no escaping them. A conflict is like a coconut. if you know how to crack it open, you get a treat of fresh coconut water and fruit. if you don't know what to do with one, it is just a heavy object you don't want falling over your head. This book will introduce readers to two important tools which can help prevent and manage conflicts in business and life in general- negotiation and mediation.Knowing how to negotiate helps you understand the other party's requirements. trying to find a middle path to meet others''interests, while still fulfilling your own, is the first step towards building long-term personal and business relationships. But even after negotiating effectively, there will be roadblocks where we stumble and become a party to a dispute.Mediation is a form of conflict resolution technique which is used all over the world to nip disagreements in the bud before they morph into all consuming, public disputes. Mediation is a technique through which disputes can be settled using limited time and finances without making your private matters public. Looking at and dealing with, not just disputes but any stressful situation differently, can change the way they affect the sum total of our life.

In addition, I am well versed in computer communication for business. Currently, into Senior Management , I am responsible for Team Management, Profitability, Strategic Planning & Decision Making, supervising sales, credit and collections. I have an intense interest in working for a reputed organisation and look forward to contributing my skills to the organisation. CAREER CONSPECTUS A dynamic professional with more than 20 years of experience in Sales & Marketing, Business Development, Client Relationship Management & Team Management across Financial & Telecom industry. Competent in implementing effective solutions to the customer needs, with an aim to improve customer contentment and consequently customer loyalty, repeat and referral business. Expertise in launch to profitability phase Skilled in managing teams to work in sync with the corporate set parameters & motivating them for achieving business and individual goals. An effective communicator with good presentation skills and abilities in forging business partnerships with dealers & channel partners. Proficient in data analysis and an eye for detail ensuring quick and steady progress. Specialties: CORE COMPETENCIES Sales & Distribution Branch Operations Business Development & Marketing Key Account Management Customer Relationship Management Team Management Profit Centre Role Hands on experience in start up to full scale launch of business and onward management
