positions.title: Strategic Assistant to the CEO
positions.description_html:
In this role, I report to the CEO and work closely with the Executive Management Team in defining and executing business strategy for the Manipal Group's Home Fragrance business.

Specific responsibilities include:
- Enabling implementation of business strategy by liaising with function heads and various program leaders.
- Ensuring that strategic initiatives maintain momentum, are tracked and followed-up to completion.
- Identification of leading indicators affecting business performance in near term and long term. Partnering with the functional heads in analyzing the trends and coordinating development of action plan.
- Ensuring cross-functional accountability for execution against objectives, identify critical issues and facilitate discussion in cross-functional forums to drive systemic resolution of issues.
- Leading and executing special projects for CEO
- Coordinating CEO reviews and participating in organizational reviews with senior management.
- Be a thought partner to the Executive Management Team in analysing industry trends, competitive actions and regulatory environment, and participate in defining company's response to external influences.

He comes with my heartfelt recommendation.”

detailed_profile.name: Umesha Mulappa
detailed_profile.position: Vice President & Business Head - Primacy Industries Ltd.
detailed_profile.about: • 23+ years of experience in Sales & Business operations including supply chain, manufacturing and Inventory. • Presently associated with Primacy Industries Ltd. (The Manipal Group) and managing a 400 Cr North American business of Air care, Personnel care along with managing Manufacturing operations of 5 Manufacturing plants , and 1300+ manpower spread over 2 states. • Have scaled up manufacturing of Home Fragrance Products by executing & commissioning of four plants. • Strategically commissioned "3 Green Field Projects” Candle unit in Gujarat in 2011-12, Aerosol Plant for export in 2011-12 , Personnel care/ Health & Hygiene plant for domestic market in 2016-17 and Wet wipes plant in 2021-22. • Hands-on experience in Production Planning for Master Data, SOPs, Demand Management, MPS/MRP, Production Orders, Capacity Planning, Variant Configuration & Batch Management, Process Management and MTO/MTS Configuration • Achievements include improvising productivity by 10% YOY. Besides, have been awarded ‘Visionary Leader for Manufacturing Excellence’ from CII & JICA in 2012-13.

experience.title: Vice President & Business Head
experience.description: •	Managing North American business for Air care and Personnel care products like Candles, room fresheners, Deo’s, Wet wipes, Perfumes, Shampoo’s, etc. •	Rich experience in Strategic business and P&L operations including planning, Procurement, R&D & Manufacturing teams at Primacy Industries, India’s Largest Home Fragrance Manufacturing Unit. •	Managing a 100 % EOU engaged in contract manufacturing for world’s largest retailers. •	Experience in end-to-end manufacturing of Candles, Air Fresheners, Aerosols, Wet wipes, Deo’s, Perfumes, Shaving foam and other personnel care products. •	Managing 5 Plants and 1300 + manpower working in these locations.•	Managing IR Issues, and ensuring non-stop production •	Managing 150+ Vendor partners, ensuring Raw materials at right time with Optimum Inventory •	Developed and sustained 5-year capital plan with paybacks of less than 4 years•	Reduction of 3% overhead cost in the year 2018-19 across all the business•	Instrumental in implementing SAP system across all business•	Monitored the whole gamut of functions pertaining to material management /Vendor development/ Subcontracts/ inventory management and logistics initiatives to build uninterrupted stream of all inputs on most competitive rates.
experience.description_html:
• Managing North American business for Air care and Personnel care products like Candles, room fresheners, Deo’s, Wet wipes, Perfumes, Shampoo’s, etc.
• Rich experience in Strategic business and P&L operations including planning, Procurement, R&D & Manufacturing teams at Primacy Industries, India’s Largest Home Fragrance Manufacturing Unit.
• Managing a 100 % EOU engaged in contract manufacturing for world’s largest retailers.
• Experience in end-to-end manufacturing of Candles, Air Fresheners, Aerosols, Wet wipes, Deo’s, Perfumes, Shaving foam and other personnel care products.
• Managing 5 Plants and 1300 + manpower working in these locations.
• Managing IR Issues, and ensuring non-stop production
• Managing 150+ Vendor partners, ensuring Raw materials at right time with Optimum Inventory
• Developed and sustained 5-year capital plan with paybacks of less than 4 years
• Reduction of 3% overhead cost in the year 2018-19 across all the business
• Instrumental in implementing SAP system across all business
• Monitored the whole gamut of functions pertaining to material management /Vendor development/ Subcontracts/ inventory management and logistics initiatives to build uninterrupted stream of all inputs on most competitive rates.

basic_info.name: Gunjan Kohli - Payroll Manager UK PAYROLL
basic_info.search_snippet: Senior Payroll Manager acting as a team lead in Successful transitioning and Migration of Payroll from UK to India for Welcome Break.

detailed_profile.name: Gunjan Kohli
detailed_profile.position: Payroll Manager UK PAYROLL
detailed_profile.about: Senior Payroll Manager acting as a team lead in Successful transitioning and Migration of Payroll from UK to India for Welcome Break and have been successfully processing the weekly and Lunar payroll since 2019.Preparation of SOPs for the entire payroll process and duly authorised by the Payroll Manager UK.Improvisation in the payroll processing.Calculation of taxes, updating of P45/Starters declaration for the employees, processing of Maternity/Paternity for the employees, calculating Statutory sick pay for the employees. Calculating the furlough payments alongside payroll during the COVID-19 as per HMRC norms. Successful implementation of SAP CONCUR for processing of expenses for the employees. Successful audit for Furlough claim submission to HMRC.Well versed with UK Legislations for the payroll as per the HMRC Norms. Handling the queries of the employees completing several years of articleship with the core area of taxation (direct & indirect) and auditing. Skills in analysis,MIS, costing, pricing,payroll Accounts receivables & financial statement audit. Handled various clients from diversified industries such as manufacturing, service and banking industry. Have knowledge in ERP, Tally and SAP(FICO) systems. Good communication skills along with team management qualities makes a perfect fit for a finance and Accounting role.

experience.title: Associate Partner
experience.description: TDS Provisions and preparation of TDS returns.•	Preparation of VAT returns and Service Tax returns.•	Preparation and filing of income tax returns of individuals,HUF , firms and companies.•	Analysis and reconciliation of various general ledger and sub-ledger for their interpretation.•	Management of day to day accounting i.e. accounts Payables & Receivables, bank reconciliation.•	Finalization of Balance Sheets in compliance with requirement of Accounting Standard and schedule VI of the Companies Act, 1956.•	Indirect tax advisory services including preparing presentation and notes in VAT / CST.•	Preparation of reply to Assessment orders, show cause notices, routine notices and other queries raised by the department.
experience.description_html:
TDS Provisions and preparation of TDS returns.
• Preparation of VAT returns and Service Tax returns.
• Preparation and filing of income tax returns of individuals,HUF , firms and companies.
• Analysis and reconciliation of various general ledger and sub-ledger for their interpretation.
• Management of day to day accounting i.e. accounts Payables & Receivables, bank reconciliation.
• Finalization of Balance Sheets in compliance with requirement of Accounting Standard and schedule VI of the Companies Act, 1956.
• Indirect tax advisory services including preparing presentation and notes in VAT / CST.
• Preparation of reply to Assessment orders, show cause notices, routine notices and other queries raised by the department.

With a focus on creating impactful #training programs, I strive to empower teams to excel in their roles and contribute to the organization's success. My experience includes #designing and implementing #strategic learning initiatives that align with business goals, enhancing employee skills, and driving performance improvements. I am committed to building a dynamic and engaging learning environment that supports both individual and organizational #development.

experience.description_html:
Manager – Training

• Designed and delivered training programs for sales, credit, and operations teams to improve productivity and compliance.
• Conducted induction programs for new hires and refresher training for existing employees on financial products, sales techniques, customer handling, and regulatory guidelines.
• Developed training modules, SOPs, and skill-development frameworks tailored to different levels (executives, branch managers, regional leaders).
• Evaluated performance through post-training assessments and on-the-job observations, ensuring measurable improvement in employee productivity.
• Partnered with senior management to identify skill gaps and create customized training roadmaps.
• Successfully trained and mentored a workforce of employees across branches/regions, contributing to business growth and improved customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Divisional Manager
experience.description: Divisional Manager Baroda Cluster	•	Directed microfinance business operations across multiple branches/divisions.	•	Managed a large team of branch managers, field officers, and support staff to ensure smooth execution of Joint Liability Group (JLG).	•	Oversaw portfolio quality, ensured high collection efficiency, and minimized NPAs.	•	Expanded microfinance outreach in semi-urban and rural markets by identifying new geographies and building strong community relations.	•	Achieved consistent year-on-year growth in loan disbursements while maintaining compliance with RBI/NBFC regulations.	•	Focused on financial inclusion, empowering underbanked customers with access to credit.
experience.description_html:
Divisional Manager Baroda Cluster

• Directed microfinance business operations across multiple branches/divisions.
• Managed a large team of branch managers, field officers, and support staff to ensure smooth execution of Joint Liability Group (JLG).
• Oversaw portfolio quality, ensured high collection efficiency, and minimized NPAs.
• Expanded microfinance outreach in semi-urban and rural markets by identifying new geographies and building strong community relations.
• Achieved consistent year-on-year growth in loan disbursements while maintaining compliance with RBI/NBFC regulations.
• Focused on financial inclusion, empowering underbanked customers with access to credit.

detailed_profile.name: Narendra Singh
detailed_profile.position: Sr. Manager - HDFC Bank | Fintech | Financial Inclusion | Rural Markets
detailed_profile.about: Having worked with Several leading Service Providers, Insurance Company & a Leading Bank as a General Management & Marketing Professional with over 16+ years of experience spanning across different functions that include creating businesses, Profit Centre Management, Retailing Assets & Liability products , Product Management and Channel / Sales Management. I have successfully launched Financial Inclusion, Pre Paid Cards, AEPS & Digital Payment (Mobile wallet and Money Transfer) in B2B, B2C & B2G along with Channel Marketing for Bhartipay services, Airpay payments, Easy Bill Pvt. Ltd ( A Hero Group Co.), Oxigen Services India Pvt. Ltd, ICICI Securities Ltd, Metlife India Pvt. Ltd & ICICI Bank Ltd. Specialties: Go-To-Market Planning & Analysis: - Strategy Planning & Management - Launches & Promotions - Public Relations - Distributor/Dealer Selection - Sales & Marketing - Team Management - Staff Training & Development - Special Programs & Event Planning - Direct End User Sales - New Stores Opening - Budget allocation & Utilization - Team Management & Business Development.
